SEARCH
Package engine.tiles

Class Grid<T>

java.lang.Object
engine.tiles.Grid<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<GridCell<T>>
public class Grid<T> extends Object implements Iterable<GridCell<T>>
Grid of a certain scale with a determined x and y count and contains value of a given type
